nodes.text: The Special Restraint Cells was a section of the Maximum Security Section, a sector of the Galactic Republic's Belsavis prison facility on the planet Belsavis. The area was designed to hold prisoners that required special restraints beyond the standard setup for most prisoners; Maximum Security Pods J-P7, J-P8 and J-P9 were located in the area, as was Solitary Confinement.
